entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 25 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming south 60 gusting to 90 this afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Showers ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
